bluebird.layers.dropout.Dropout¶

class bluebird.layers.dropout.Dropout(output_size: int, droput_rate: float)¶

Bases: bluebird.layers.linear.Linear

It ignores some of inouts and scales other ones, Usefull to escape overfitting

Parameters

  • output_size – number of neurons, Type: int

  • dropout_rate – percent of inputs the network ignores, Type: float (1:=100%)

Example

>>> dropout = Dropout(50, dropout_rate=0.02)
>>> net = NeuralNet([
            ...
            dropout
            ...
        ])
__init__(output_size: int, droput_rate: float) → None¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
